```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("readdata.R", local = knitr::knit_global())

library(janitor)
library(cowplot)
library(see)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}


table1 %>% 
    ggplot(aes(pub_year, fill = pathogen_group))+
  geom_bar()+
  theme_minimal_hgrid()+
  scale_fill_see_d()+
  labs(x = "Publication year",
       y = "Number of articles",
       fill = "Pathogen group")
  

```


```{r echo=FALSE}

table1 %>% 
  tabyl(crop, organ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(2:15, names_to = "organ", values_to = "n") %>% 
  filter(n >0) %>%
    select(-2) %>% 
  group_by(crop) %>% 
  summarize(n2 = sum(n)) %>% 
  arrange(-n2) %>% 
   head(20) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(reorder(crop,n2), n2, fill = n2))+
  geom_col()+
  theme_minimal_vgrid()+
  coord_flip()+
  scale_fill_flat_c()+
  labs(x = "",
       y = "Number of articles",
       fill = "Pathogen group")
```
